tours.title: Desert Safari + Dhow Cruise
tours.description: Experience the ultimate combination of desert adventure and luxury cruise. Enjoy thrilling dune bashing, camel riding, sand boarding, and traditional entertainment in the desert, followed by a relaxing dinner cruise with stunning views.
tours.description2:
DESERT SAFARI: Experience 45 minutes of thrilling dune bashing in Lahbab desert, camel riding, and sand boarding. Enjoy traditional entertainment including henna painting, sheesha smoking, and belly & Tanura dance performances. Savor a wide variety of international dishes in the dinner buffet with unlimited soft drinks, tea, and coffee.

DHOW CRUISE: Perfect for romantic dinners, special occasions, or corporate events. Enjoy a relaxing dinner with stunning views while celebrating birthdays, anniversaries, or any special event.

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel/Location/Residence in Dubai
inclusions.desert_activities: 45 minutes dune bashing, camel riding, sand boarding
inclusions.entertainment: Henna painting, sheesha smoking, belly & Tanura dance
inclusions.dinner: International buffet dinner with unlimited soft drinks, tea, and coffee
inclusions.cruise: Dhow cruise dinner with stunning views

tours.title: Dubai City Tour + Desert Safari
tours.description: Experience the best of Dubai with our comprehensive city tour and thrilling desert safari. Explore iconic landmarks during the day and enjoy an exciting desert adventure in the evening.
tours.description2:
DUBAI CITY TOUR: Explore Dubai with our expert tour guide visiting main attractions including Dubai Creek, Dubai Museum, Jumeirah Mosque, Jumeirah Beach, Burj Al-Arab hotel, Madinat Jumeirah, Palm Jumeirah Island, Atlantis Hotel, Dubai Marina, Mall of Emirates, Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, and King Palace.

DESERT SAFARI: Experience 45 minutes of thrilling dune bashing in Lahbab desert, camel riding, and sand boarding. Enjoy traditional entertainment including henna painting, sheesha smoking, and belly & Tanura dance performances. Savor a wide variety of international dishes in the dinner buffet with unlimited soft drinks, tea, and coffee.
tours.title2: Dubai City Tour + Desert Safari Package

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel/Location/Residence in Dubai
inclusions.city_tour: Expert guided tour of Dubai's main attractions
inclusions.desert_activities: 45 minutes dune bashing, camel riding, sand boarding
inclusions.entertainment: Henna painting, sheesha smoking, belly & Tanura dance
inclusions.dinner: International buffet dinner with unlimited soft drinks, tea, and coffee
